Schema Editor Notes

Published on 1970-01-01 by @danja

I wanted an RDF Schema for the LlamaIndex sparql.py. It isn't necessary at this point in time, but nice to have for documentation & completeness.

Just links for now.

http://purl.org/stuff/er
